TopicTitle: Do I need to put control surfaces on wings and winglets or do they already have them?

Articles.Content: Just curious, it seems like I can control them fine. Are control surfaces just in case I want to use structural parts for wings instead of wings and want to add control?
Control surfaces are for the large structural wings, only canards and winglets can control themselves.
To clarify, the control you're probably getting even with no control surfaces is probably coming from gimballing engines and/or torque applied by the command pod.
